Jackie Johnston

Currently lives and works in Kihei, Hawaii.
www.jackiejohnston.com  |  @heartsbeach

Art Classes & Workshops Taken

  • 2020Big Ink Woodblock Workshop taught by Lyell Castonguay, San Francisco, Calif.
  • 2019Lino Reduction Workshop taught by Joseph Vorgity, Santa Monica, Calif.
  • 2017Oil Painting Workshop taught by Calvin Liang, Corona, Calif.
  • 2017Plein Air Workshop taught by Eric Merrell, Joshua Tree, Calif.
  • 2016 Fall Qtr.Plein Air Painting (ACN-114W) taught by Robert Sherrill, Art Center at Night, Pasadena, Calif.
  • 2011 Fall Qtr.Painting I (Art 2151) taught by Tracy Petre, Columbia Basin College, Pasco, Wash.

Group Exhibits & Awards

  • 2021Mālama Wao Akua Juried by Chenta Laury & Kerri Fay, Hui No'eau Visual Arts Center, Makawao, Hawaii (Juried group exhibit.)
  • 2020Members Only Online Show (MOOS) Juried by Clark G. Mitchell, Pastel Society of the West Coast (Online juried group exhibit.)
  • 2020Wild World Gold Medal Exhibit  with other California Art League members. Juried by Victor Picou, (Online juried group exhibit.)
  • 2019Motion Gold Metal Exhibit  with other California Art League members. Juried by Laura Wambsgans, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried group exhibit.)
  • 2019LahainaTown Action Committee and Lahaina Arts Society's Annual Poster Contest Juried by committee, Old Jail Gallery, Lahaina, Hawaii (Juried open group exhibit.)
  • 2019Renewal Juried by Anette Power, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried open group exhibit.)
  • 2018Fantasy Gold Metal Exhibit  with other California Art League members. Juried by Dino Mehaffie, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried group exhibit.)
  • 2018Expressions  with other California Art League members. Juried by Joe Cibere, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried open group exhibit.)
  • 2018Los Angeles Plein Air Festival Judged by Shana Nys Dambrot, Farmers & Merchants Bank, Los Angeles, Calif. (Open group exhibit.) Won honorable mention in the other/mixed media category for Old Plaza Firehouse.
  • 2018Rock, Paper, Scissors Juried by Mary Sherwood Brock, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried open group exhibit.)
  • 2017Glow Gold Metal Exhibit  with other California Art League members. Juried by Donna Geist Buch, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried group exhibit.)
  • 2017Dreams  with other California Art League members. Juried by Otto Sturcke, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried group exhibit.)
  • 2017Muse & Mystique Women's City Club of Pasadena Exhibit. Blinn House, Pasadena, Calif. (Curated invitational group exhibit.)
  • 2017Color Me Bold Juried by Donna Geist Buch, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried open group exhibit.)
  • 2016Red  with other California Art League members. Juried by Margaret Danielak, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried group exhibit.)
  • 2016Spirits of the Night Gold Medal Exhibit  with other California Art League members. Juried by Ellen Brown, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried group exhibit.) Won Merchandise Award for Big Top Swinger.
  • 2016Passion! Women's City Club of Pasadena Exhibit. Blinn House, Pasadena, Calif. (Curated invitational group exhibit.)
  • 2016Plein Air at the Fair  with other California Art Club members. Millard Sheets Art Center, Pomona, Calif. (Non-curated invitational group exhibit.) Won Audience Favorite award for Big Top Swinger.
  • 2016Flight & Flow  with other California Art League members. Juried by Victor Picou, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried group exhibit.) Won Best of Show award for Port Angeles.
  • 2015Gold Medal Exhibit  with other California Art League members. Juried by Daggi Wallace, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried group exhibit.)
  • 2015SeaScapes Juried by Mallory Whitfield, Light Space & Time (Online juried group exhibit.) Won 6th place overall and 4th place in the painting category awards for Beach Walker.
  • 2015Made in the USA Collection Curated by Jessica McQueen, Saatchi Art (Online curated group invitational exhibit.)
  • 2012Juried Student Art Show  with other Columbia Basin College art students. Curated by Mary Dryburgh, Esvelt Art Gallery, Pasco, Wash. (Curated invitational group exhibit.) Won Community Award and Purchase Award for Attempted Murder of Crows.

Collections

  • Esvelt Art Gallery, Columbia Basin College, Pasco, Wash.
